original: Bendt, Kurt Harald, direktör, Linköping, f. 20/4/06 i Kiruna, Norrb. 1. G. 39 m. Gerd Tuweson. Barn: Christina f. 40, Håkan 43, Thomas 46. — Giv:ekonom 35. Dir. i Svea Band- & Pappers A-B i Linköping sed. 39.
translated: Bendt, Kurt Harald, director, Linköping, born April 20th, 1906 in Kiruna, Norrbotten. 1st marriage in 1939 to Gerd Tuweson. Children: Christina born in 1940, Håkan in 1943, and Thomas in 1946. Started a giving economy in 1935. Director of Svea Band & Pappers A-B in Linköping since 1939.
